file.name: Архив ZIP -ТИКАЙ С СЕЛА ТОБI ПЭЗ........zip

list.description: All scaling ratios can be used

#puma

PUMA Sight
Zoom : 2.0x - 14.7x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_schutzenpanzer_puma

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_schutzenpanzer_puma

all in
https://live.warthunder.com/post/993921/en/
​

Minimalistic tank sight

Minimalistic tank sight inspired by WOJTEK885's sight found here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1052013/en/

Should work on all tanks (although I have not tested). Just put the "all_tanks" folder from the zip file inside the UserSights folder or if you already have an "all_tanks" folder, extract the minimal_sight.blk to the existing folder.

The pictures show the sight on the bmp-2m.

Edit:
Added new version. +1

Enjoy!

#all_tanks #simple #minimal #sight #ifv #mbt

#rooikat_76 #rookait #rooikat76

Sight on "Ruikat" with 76 mm gun.

Those who follow my updates: I'm kind of dead and stuck in my studies... But mostly I'm too lazy to make new scopes. I would like to do something new, but as I understand it, it is now fashionable to cling anime girls to the sight. Hmm, I don't understand this fashion.

I made the sight for myself, based on some kind of sight, like from a Challenger ...

And he also fits the Vickers MK3.

good luck ;3
Soppo

This sight is based on another user's sight though heavily modified for this ammo and longer ranges. See credit at the end of description.

This is a sight for the MAUS that gives you several ranging options and accurate aiming for both primary and secondary weapons at the same time. The secondary accuracy is only going to be right on for the Hl.Gr 38C likely for the B as well but it was tuned for the 38C. The Trajectory is based on the average observed landing spots. There will of course be variation but this is the best I could do.

Primary weapon ranging will auto correct for any ammuni...

Sight with many Sizes.

1. download the ZIP Folder
2. creat a file withe the name (UserSights)
3. creat in the Folder (UserSights) a second Folder with the name (all_tanks) in War Thunder Folder
4. extract the ZIP Folder
5. copy all Files
6. paste all Files in the Folder War Thunder/UserSights/all_tanks
7. go to the game press Options, Chose Common Battle Settings, go to Use alternative sight grid, delete if you have
this file (exp_class_sight_1), press Add a grid Sight.
8. Chose the best size for your Tank
9. Enjoy !!!!!!!!!!

ZTZ-96 and ZTZ-96A

Fictional FCS for the ZTZ-96 and 96A. The .blk file is well documented, Color changing should be easy to do.

#china #ground_forces #ztz96a #tank

Long range (3km) artillery sight for #sturmtiger .
Each line is 10 meters, indicator at center is for aligning with squad marker for indirect firing via drone.

Was previously uploaded but was deleted afterwards, the downloaded files were incompatible so I combined them into a usable form, will delete at request of the original author.

Modernised fictional Fire Control System for the CV 90105 XC-8 with red default and green illuminated colors. The .blk file is well documented, Color changing should be easy to do.

突击虎瞄具02版本，灵感来自于战地5突击虎瞄具，轮廓采用T-34-76
修复了700m与800m刻度的误差，添加了50m 150m 250m....1650m的刻度，最大刻射程加到3km
同时对之前01版本瞄具造就的误差表示抱歉

fixed 700m and 800m mistake，added 50m 150m 250m......1650m range，maximum range 3km
I apologize for the error of the sturmtiger01 sight
A custom sight for the American H-34 that keeps the old style and parts of the old sight, but makes the rocket trajectories match the angled lines
